Am a prolific writer and poet striving to be better. My mission is to help people understand and appreciate the world. Here are some of my top picks.

The First Time We Kissed

The first kiss is definately a memorable one, whether it be a gentle peck or deep kiss.Take a trip down memory lane to your first kiss with this poem by Kelly Roper.

Endless Self-Doubt

The lack of confidence can turn your world into a really dark place. "Endless self Doubt" another poem by Kelly Roper takes you through his journey as an armature poet
